trans-unit.source: The exception that is thrown when a binding system or another schema representation system for XAML reports an exception to the schema context.
trans-unit.target: 當 XAML 的繫結系統或其他結構描述表示系統向結構描述內容報告例外狀況時，所擲回的例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xaml.XamlSchemaException> is thrown by several cases in the CLR binding support classes that provide the schema context for .NET Framework XAML Services (<xref:System.Xaml.XamlXmlReader>, <xref:System.Xaml.XamlObjectWriter>, or <xref:System.Xaml.XamlServices>).
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xaml.XamlSchemaException> CLR 繫結支援類別，可讓.NET Framework XAML 服務的結構描述內容中的幾種情況下會擲回 (<xref:System.Xaml.XamlXmlReader>， <xref:System.Xaml.XamlObjectWriter>，或<xref:System.Xaml.XamlServices>)。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Xaml.XamlSchemaException> is typically passed as the inner exception for other exceptions, such as the <xref:System.Xaml.XamlMember.IsUnknown%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>-true property for a <xref:System.Xaml.XamlObjectWriterException>, so it should be uncommon to catch a <xref:System.Xaml.XamlSchemaException> directly unless you are implementing a component such as a specialized object writer.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Xaml.XamlSchemaException>通常當做內部例外狀況的其他例外狀況，例如傳遞<xref:System.Xaml.XamlMember.IsUnknown%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>-true 屬性<xref:System.Xaml.XamlObjectWriterException>，因此它應該是罕見攔截<xref:System.Xaml.XamlSchemaException>直接除非您這類實作的元件特定的物件寫入器。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Xaml.XamlSchemaException" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Xaml.XamlSchemaException" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Xaml.XamlSchemaException" /> class with a system-supplied message that describes the error.
trans-unit.target: 以系統提供的錯誤說明訊息，初始化 <see cref="T:System.Xaml.XamlSchemaException" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The message that describes the exception.
The caller of this constructor is required to ensure that this string has been localized for the current system culture.
trans-unit.target: 這個建構函式的呼叫端必須確保這個字串已經被當地語系化 (為了目前系統的文化特性)。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Xaml.XamlSchemaException" /> class with a specified message that describes the error.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的錯誤說明訊息，初始化 <see cref="T:System.Xaml.XamlSchemaException" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The object that holds the serialized object data.
trans-unit.target: 存放序列物件資料的物件。

trans-unit.source: The contextual information about the source or destination.
trans-unit.target: 關於來源或目的端的內容資訊。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Xaml.XamlSchemaException" /> class with serialized data.
trans-unit.target: 使用序列化資料，初始化 <see cref="T:System.Xaml.XamlSchemaException" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The message that describes the exception.
The caller of this constructor is required to ensure that this string has been localized for the current system culture.
trans-unit.target: 這個建構函式的呼叫端必須確保這個字串已經被當地語系化 (為了目前系統的文化特性)。

trans-unit.source: The exception that is the cause of the current exception.
trans-unit.target: 做為目前例外狀況發生原因的例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: If the <c>innerException</c> parameter is not <see langword="null" />, the current exception is raised in a <see langword="catch" /> block that handles the inner exception.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <c>innerException</c> 參數不是 <see langword="null" />，則目前的例外狀況會在處理內部例外的 <see langword="catch" /> 區塊中引發。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Xaml.XamlSchemaException" /> class with a specified error message and a reference to the inner exception that is the cause of this exception.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的錯誤訊息以及造成此例外狀況的內部例外狀況的參考，初始化 <see cref="T:System.Xaml.XamlSchemaException" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: An exception that is thrown as a direct result of a previous exception should include a reference to the previous exception in the <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 被擲回以做為前一個例外狀況直接結果的例外狀況，應該在 <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> 屬性中包含對前一個例外狀況的參考。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> property returns the same value that is passed into the constructor, or `null` if the <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> property does not supply the inner exception value to the constructor.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> 屬性會傳回與傳入建構函式中相同的值；如果 `null` 屬性沒有提供內部例外值給建構函式，則傳回 <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>。
